title: The Art of the potter
creator_credit: David Outerbridge, Sidney Reichman and Phoenix Films
brief_description: This film presents the work of English potter Bernard Leach and Japanese potter Shoji hamada. Shows each potter demonstrating and discussing his craft, beginning with the digging of clay through to its firing in a kiln. Suitable for Upper Secondary students.
